content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":28331,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e416e5d6-cb0a-4aa2-8cb0-9b0b21c445b1/QE_onboarding_14.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e416e5d6-cb0a-4aa2-8cb0-9b0b21c445b1/QE_onboarding_14.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_14.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_14.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e416e5d6-cb0a-4aa2-8cb0-9b0b21c445b1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":509,\"height\":149},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security testing is important to protect the system from malicious activities on the network. This testing method is used to verify the security of the system, as well as to analyze the risks associated with hacker attacks, viruses, unauthorized access to confidential data. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security testing is a large area that includes testing various kinds of applications. Security testing can be of different levels: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security scanning.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" In addition to scanning, several manual checks for platform-specific vulnerabilities are usually performed. A report is compiled based on the results.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vulnerability assessment of the application.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" It is performed entirely manually. The duration can take up to several weeks. The goal is to find all vulnerabilities in the system without further penetration into the system. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Penetration testing.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Based on the vulnerability assessment, the system is penetrated to gain access to specific data. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Red Teaming.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" These are the same penetration tests, only regular. In order to assess vulnerabilities and understand how to eliminate them. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security testing is an ongoing activity. Today some component of the system/ application is not vulnerable, while tomorrow it may become insecure.   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is the portrait of an ideal candidate for Security team? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First, this is someone who is interested in developing in this field, with relevant professional experience or experience in related fields: system engineering, development and testing. This will allow integrating past project experience gained in other areas into new tasks and will give an opportunity to look at them from a new angle. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For Junior and Middle Security Engineer, there will be a huge overlap in skills with Systems Engineer from other disciplines, especially with Cloud and Core DevOps. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Senior and Lead specialists need to be able to build Enterprise Security Programs, Information Security Management Systems, conduct Security Assessments, as well as deeply understand the requirements of Regulations and Compliance, be able to transform their requirements into a specific technical and process implementation. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is also a job title in EPAM: Security Architect. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Learn
